Dave

posts.post_title: Wanted: Charles Buffinton N172, N690, E233, N403
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Marc S.
I may have an N172, but it is not for sale.  As for the E223, I was the underbidder the last time that was available - and that was in the Spring 2006 REA auction, where a Good example [better eye appeal than the technical grade] sold for close to $7,500
